scripts.text:
USE SCHEMA PETS_DB.DW;

TRUNCATE TABLE STG_SEATTLE_PET_LICENSE;

COPY INTO STG_SEATTLE_PET_LICENSE (
    LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE,
    LICENSE_NUMBER,
    ANIMAL_NAME,
    SPECIES,
    PRIMARY_BREED,
    SECONDARY_BREED,
    ZIP_CODE
)
FROM (
    SELECT 
        TRY_TO_DATE($1:LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE::VARCHAR),
        $1:LICENSE_NUMBER::VARCHAR,
        $1:ANIMAL_NAME::VARCHAR,
        $1:SPECIES::VARCHAR,
        $1:PRIMARY_BREED::VARCHAR,
        $1:SECONDARY_BREED::VARCHAR,
        $1:ZIP_CODE::VARCHAR
    FROM @azure_parquet_stage/seattle_pet_licenses.parquet
)
FILE_FORMAT = (TYPE = PARQUET)
ON_ERROR = 'CONTINUE';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS rows_loaded FROM STG_SEATTLE_PET_LICENSE;
